name: Organic Vermicompost
details: Premium quality organic vermicompost to improve soil aeration and enhance plant growth. Rich in essential nutrients and beneficial microbes, suitable for all types of plants.
reviews: My plants have shown amazing growth after using this compost. Highly recommend!
Great for kitchen gardens and container plants. Very clean and good quality.
usage: Mix 200g vermicompost per plant into topsoil. Reapply every 30-45 days for best results.

name: Seaweed Extract Liquid Fertilizer
details: Natural liquid seaweed extract that boosts plant immunity, enhances flowering, and improves nutrient uptake. Supports root growth and overall plant vigor for both indoor and outdoor plants.
reviews: Excellent for my orchids and flowering plants. They look lush and healthier now!
Easy to use and my indoor plants have shown great results.
usage: Dilute as per dosage and apply to soil or spray on leaves every 2 weeks during active growth.

name: Liquid Mustard Cake Fertilizer
details: Natural mustard cake liquid fertilizer for promoting flowering and root development. Organic and safe for edible plants like vegetables and herbs.
reviews: My flowering plants are blooming beautifully after using this.
Great for vegetables. Healthy and organic!
usage: Dilute as per dosage and apply directly to soil around roots every 15 days during growing season.

name: Neem Oil Insecticide
details: Cold-pressed neem oil for natural pest control. Effective against aphids, whiteflies, and mealybugs. Safe for indoor and edible plants.
reviews: Controlled mealybugs within a week. Totally recommend!
Natural and safe. I use this on my herbs and veggies without worry.
dosage: 5ml neem oil + few drops of liquid soap in 1L water
usage: Mix as per dosage and spray on plants every 7-10 days for preventive care or immediate pest treatment.

name: Bone Meal Organic Fertilizer
details: Rich source of phosphorus and calcium for strong root development and abundant flowering. Organic and suitable for all flowering and fruiting plants.
reviews: Noticed better flowering after using this on my roses!
Great for fruit plants. Natural and easy to apply.
usage: Mix as per dosage into topsoil. Apply every 6-8 weeks during growing season.

name: Cocopeat Brick (Compressed)
details: High-quality compressed cocopeat brick that expands to 5-6 liters when hydrated. Improves soil aeration and moisture retention, ideal for potting mixes.
reviews: Very clean and expands a lot. Great for my seedlings!
Improves moisture retention. I mix this with garden soil for best results.
usage: Soak brick in 5L water for 30 minutes to expand. Mix with soil in a 1:1 ratio for potting. No dosage required.

name: Watering Can
details: Elegant and durable watering can with a long spout for precise watering. Rust-free and lightweight, perfect for indoor and outdoor plants.
reviews: Perfect for my balcony plants. Lightweight and easy to use.
The long spout makes watering hassle-free and neat, doesn't spill at all.
usage: Fill with water and use spout for controlled flow to avoid overwatering. Suitable for delicate plants.

name: Garden Tools Kit (5 pcs)
details: Complete garden tool kit including trowel, pruner, fork, rake, and transplanter. Durable metal with ergonomic handles for easy gardening.
reviews: Perfect kit for small gardens and balcony plants.
Very durable and easy to hold. Value for money!
usage: Use for planting, pruning, weeding, and soil preparation. Clean after each use for long life.
